add_barcode_to_pdf.description: Generate a barcode image and add it to a specific location on a PDF.

props.name: sourcePdfUrl
props.description: URL of the PDF file to add the barcode to.

props.name: barcodeValue
props.description: The text or data to encode in the barcode.

props.name: barcodeType
props.description: Select the type of barcode to generate.

props.name: x
props.description: X coordinate (from top-left corner) to place the barcode.

props.name: y
props.description: Y coordinate (from top-left corner) to place the barcode.

props.name: width
props.description: Optional width for the barcode image on the PDF (in points). Aspect ratio is kept by default.

props.name: height
props.description: Optional height for the barcode image on the PDF (in points). Aspect ratio is kept by default.

props.name: pages
props.description: Comma-separated page numbers or ranges to add the barcode (e.g., "0,2,5-10"). Leave empty for all pages.

add_image_to_pdf.description: Add image to a PDF document.

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the PDF file to modify.

props.name: xCoordinate
props.description: X coordinate (from top-left corner) to place the image.

props.name: yCoordinate
props.description: Y coordinate (from top-left corner) to place the image.

props.name: width
props.description: Optional width for the image on the PDF (in points). Aspect ratio is kept by default.

props.name: height
props.description: Optional height for the image on the PDF (in points). Aspect ratio is kept by default.

props.name: pages
props.description: Specify page indices as comma-separated values or ranges to process (e.g. "0, 1, 2-" or "1, 2, 3-7").

props.description: URL of the PDF file to modify.

props.description: Specify page indices as comma-separated values or ranges to process (e.g. "0, 1, 2-" or "1, 2, 3-7").

convert_html_to_pdf.description: Convert HTML code into a downloadable PDF document.

props.name: html
props.description: The HTML code to convert to PDF.

props.name: name
props.description: Desired name for the output PDF file (e.g., "result.pdf").

props.name: margins
props.description: CSS style margins (e.g., "10px", "5mm 5mm 5mm 5mm" for top, right, bottom, left).

props.name: paperSize
props.description: Select a paper size. For custom sizes, input the value directly (e.g., \

props.name: orientation
props.description: Set page orientation.

props.name: printBackground
props.description: Set to true to print background graphics and colors (default is true).

props.name: mediaType
props.description: CSS media type to emulate.

props.name: header
props.description: HTML content for the page header.

props.name: footer
props.description: HTML content for the page footer.

props.name: doNotWaitFullLoad
props.displayName: Do not wait till full page load ?

props.name: expiration
props.description: Set the expiration time for the output link in minutes (default is 60).

props.name: profiles
props.description: JSON object for additional configurations.

convert_pdf_to_structured_format.description: Convert PDF content into structured formats (JSON, CSV, or XML).

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the PDF file to convert.

props.name: outputFormat
props.description: Select the desired structured output format.

props.name: pages
props.description: Comma-separated page numbers or ranges (e.g., "0,2,5-10"). Leave empty for all pages.

props.name: lang
props.description: Language for OCR if processing scanned documents (e.g., "eng", "deu", "eng+deu"). See PDF.co docs for list.

props.name: profiles
props.description: JSON object for additional configurations.

extract_tables_from_pdf.description: Extracts table data from a PDF using a predefined PDF.co Document Parser template.

props.name: url
props.description: URL of the PDF file to extract tables from.

props.name: templateId
props.description: The ID of your Document Parser template (created in PDF.co dashboard) designed to extract the table(s).

props.name: pages
props.description: Comma-separated page numbers or ranges (e.g., "0,2,5-10"). Overrides template settings if provided.

props.name: profiles
props.description: JSON object for additional configurations.

search_and_replace_text.displayName: Search and Replace Text in PDF
search_and_replace_text.description: Search for specific text or patterns in a PDF and replace it with new text.

props.name: url
props.description: URL to the source PDF file.

props.name: caseSensitive
props.description: Set to true for case-sensitive search, false otherwise.

props.name: regex
props.description: Set to true to use regular expressions for search texts.

props.name: pages
props.description: Comma-separated page numbers or ranges (e.g., "0,2,5-10"). Leave empty for all pages.
